title: Jessica London Women's Plus Size Tummy Control Bi-Stretch Midi Skirt

Our new slimming suiting collection features improved 2-way stretch that holds it shape and moves with you as you move through your busy day. Hidden tummy control panels offer a slimming fit. Back elastic insets; front slash pockets; button-zip closure. Back vent.

Plus, the most covetable accessories allow you to spin your look into something totally unique. After all, you can achieve anything - if you’re dressed for it!
